summary: An evil sorceress feeds the blood of new brides to a Shaitan, an ancient and fearsome demon.
cast: Sunil Dhawan|Shehnaz Kudia|Neelam Mehra|Surendra Pal|Deepak Parashar|K.K. Raj|Ranjeet|Satish Shah|Shamsuddin|Kanwaljit Singh|Sripradha|Sunaina|Mini Tabassum|Ashalata Wabgaonkar
title: Shaitani Ilaaka
